column5: This programme is suitable for those wishing to carry out a short, in-depth research project, and not attend taught programmes. The MSc by Research programmes consist of induction courses, an eight-month research project and a period to write it up. The degree is carefully tailored to your interests, and can be particularly suitable for people undertaking research in a work-based context wishing to gain an academic qualification.See website for information on course structure and modules.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
